attributes.action: ban the putting of stickers onto apples, bananas etc
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: What purpose does this exercise mean to serve, other than the creation of litter. We have enough litter in this country. Apples are a natural product, adding sticker to them which bedeck out streets (and on one occassion my car) with small sticky reminders of their former being benefits nobody.
